page.title: 14ATTITUDES TO KINGSCOTE
page.content: Residents enjoy the quietness, peace and tranquillity(59%) of a rural {lifestyle}(21%) in beautiful countryside (41%). Specific details of the advantage of living here include friendly people and community, the slow pace of life, the healthy air, solitude, space and the lack of "hooligans", in this small, unspoilt and yet accessible village. The main drawback of living here (apart from the lack of shops) is the cold windy winter with hazardous driving conditions and roads sometimes blocked with snow. Developments of new expensive property have altered the balance between farming village and up-market dormitory. This has brought more young children and breathed new life into the community this is welcomed by most but resented by a few.
